definition: Kaijiang county in Dazhou 達州|达州[Da2 zhou1], Sichuan

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
Kaijiang county in Dazhou 達州|达州[Da2 zhou1], Sichuan

sentences.english: The main Carboniferous reservoir rocks in Kaijiang area are granular and rubble dolomites.
sentences.chinese: 開江地區石炭系儲集巖類主要爲顆粒雲巖和角礫雲巖。
